__TOC__

UNetbootin is the easiest way to put an bootable Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_image | ISO ]]</nowiki> onto a <nowiki>[[ http:--en.wikipedia.org-wiki-USB_flash_drive | USB flash drive. ]]</nowiki><<BR>>
<nowiki>[[File:unetbootin_screenshot.png]]</nowiki>
===== Using UNetbootin =====
You must add UNetbootin to Ubuntu before you use it.  Install this package: '''unetbootin'''
* Insert your USB flash drive
* Run Unetbootin and enter your administrative password.
* Click "..." and find the image you downloaded, start in "Computer", /home/karl/Downloads/ubuntu.iso
* Click "Ok", and wait three minutes.
You're done!
